input_text.Prompt:
Cisco and Salesforce are partnering to align collaboration, Internet of Things, and contact center technologies.

Specifically, the two companies will jointly develop and market products that combine Cisco's Spark and WebEx into Salesforce's Sales and Service Clouds. The integration will integrate chat, video, and voice features.

More importantly, Cisco's Jasper IoT platform will integrate with Salesforce's IoT cloud. The combination should give Salesforce's Einstein artificial intelligence platform more data and visibility. See: Salesforce's Einstein AI platform: What you need to know

The partnership with Salesforce complements Cisco's IoT and collaboration deals with IBM.

Salesforce's IoT Cloud tracks customer actions while Cisco's Jasper platform targets more back-end enterprise assets.

On the customer service front, Salesforce's Service Cloud will integrate with Cisco's Unified Contact Center Enterprise systems.

The collaboration integration between Salesforce and Cisco will be available in the second half of 2017. Customers will need licenses from both Salesforce and Cisco Spark or WebEx. IoT integrations will also be available in the second half of 2017 with contact center and service combinations ready now.

Generate a summary:
input_text.Response A: Salesforce and Cisco have announced plans to partner to develop products that combine the companies' collaboration, Internet of Things (IoT), and contact centre technologies. The companies will jointly develop and market products that combine Cisco Spark and WebEx with Salesforce's Sales and Service Clouds. The collaboration integration will offer customers chat, video, and voice features. Cisco's Jasper IoT platform will also integrate with Salesforce's IoT cloud, providing the Einstein artificial intelligence platform with more data and visibility. The partnership with Salesforce complements Cisco's IoT and collaboration deals with IBM.
input_text.Response B:
Cisco and Salesforce have entered into a strategic partnership to align their collaboration, Internet of Things (IoT), and contact center technologies. This collaborative effort will enable the development and marketing of products that seamlessly integrate Cisco's Spark and WebEx into Salesforce's Sales and Service Clouds, thereby providing customers with a comprehensive suite of tools to enhance their collaboration and customer service capabilities.

The integration will facilitate the inclusion of chat, video, and voice features, thereby enabling more effective and efficient communication between customers and service representatives. Additionally, Cisco's Jasper IoT platform will be integrated with Salesforce's IoT cloud, providing the latter with access to more data and enhanced visibility. This integration is expected to complement Cisco's existing collaboration and IoT deals with IBM.

On the customer service front, Salesforce's Service Cloud will be integrated with Cisco's Unified Contact Center Enterprise systems, enabling customers to receive personalized and efficient service. The collaboration integration between Salesforce and Cisco is expected to be available in the second half of 2017, while the IoT integrations will be available at the same time, with contact center and service combinations ready now.

In summary, this partnership between Cisco and Salesforce is poised to revolutionize the way businesses collaborate and interact with their customers, providing them with a comprehensive suite of tools and technologies to enhance their collaboration and customer service capabilities. The integration of Cisco's Spark and WebEx with Salesforce's Sales and Service Clouds, along with the integration of Cisco's Jasper IoT platform with Salesforce's IoT cloud, will provide businesses with unparalleled visibility and control over their customer interactions and back-end enterprise assets.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
